Wolfblade::

  She grinned. "My turn huh. WEll, first off, wolves are not bounty 
hunters in the same way your thinking. But hunters we are. As for a 
secret I possess, I will tell you one thing. It doesn't take two to 
keep a secret."  She grinned and sipped her drink. "However, I do 
believe in returning a favor for a favor. First off, Yes, I am from 
another dimension. How I got here or why I'm here is beyond my mental 
processors. However, I do know what will tempt Unicron. IT's three 
things he can't resist. Energy, knowledge and metal.  HE uses metal 
to rejuvinate himself, energy for the same reasons we need it, and 
knowledge. He wants to be a god. Better than the matrix. He thinks 
he's the smartest thing out there and that he knows everything there 
is to know except the future. But since he's almost invincable, he 
doesn't care about attacks from smaller enemies. He's too big to 
stop. However, he can still be outsmarted. Ever hear of something 
called a BlackHole?  I did it once before in my universe. We had 
rigged something to make Unicron think we had found the EYE OF THE 
MATRIX.  It lets one see into the past, present and future. He wanted 
it so bad, he followed me into a black hole. I made it by chance out 
the other end. He was way to big to fit through the small Quazar and 
was stuck forever. So, now you have info on me." She grinned, "Oh, 
and one more little thing, if you want a secret about me. I am made 
of a substance called Zianium. It's stronger and more duable than 
Transmetal. But unlike metal, it can, ah, heal itself. LIke a true 
organic can heal from a wound or sickness. And, I have a substance 
similar to the organic liquid called blood. It's thicker and has a 
blue color, but it's not just mech fluid. I was one of seven like 
myself. We were the prototypes. But, well, "  she looked at her 
drink. "Never mind anyway, favor returned. Find something to look 
like an EYE OF THE MATRIX and lure Unicron into a black hole. He'll 
fall in and your rid of him."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> "This ability is what I was wanting to use to boost the Tripred's 
cannon.  By casting a net over large energon deposits, I can absorb 
and refine enough energy to repulse Unicron.  I'm tellin' you 
because, well three reasons.  One, I figure since you are from an 
alternate dimention.  You probably won't blab anything to just 
anyone.  Your a wolf, I am a bounty hunter.  We probably possess 
skills that complement each other.  The other?  You remind me so much 
like Organics and myself."
> He paused to drink his whiskey- and - energon cocktail.
> "Now, I have devulged a closly guarded secret.  It's your turn."   
> 
> shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> Wolfblade::
> 
> She was impressed by Malice's ability to absorb energy as he could. 
> But she tried not to show it. She drank her cup and looked at 
> him. "OK, so far, you have a gift and you don't want others to know 
> about it. But a question forms in my thought procesors, why tell me 
> if you don't want anyone else to know? Unless you have an offer to 
> give me, plan on killing me later on, or perhaps, you have the need 
> to tell me this because you need help with something related to 
this 
> little gift of yours. Tell me how close I am on that." She looked 
at 
> him, "But yes, I shall keep what you ask confidencial. After all, 
if 
> you can't trust your fellow fighters, who can you trust."  She 
smiled 
> and winked at him. "I'm a wolf. We keep secrets well." 
> 
> 
>
